name: Cubic Dash (diVISION+)
description:
DESCRIPTION

I designed and programmed Cubic Dash as practice for making a basic game in Unity.  This game is based on a game model by Brackeys on YouTube (link below).

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPV2KyIb3jR53Jce9hP7G5xC4O9AgnOuL

I reverse-engineered the mechanics and added my own scripts, doing so based on the final game result.

While this game is complete, it is merely a prototype.  Check it out and play through the levels if you find it interesting.

CONTROLS

The left and right arrow keys move the cube.

OBJECTIVE

Move the cube left and right to avoid the blue obstacles.  Reach the end of the level to progress.  There are a total of 3 levels currently.
